Package Description
org.jfree.chart
Core classes, including JFreeChart and ChartPanel.

    Methods in org.jfree.chart with parameters of type LegendChangeListener 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Legend.addChangeListener​(LegendChangeListener listener)

    Deregisters an object for notification of changes to the legend.
